SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk.api

Interface AnalysisExtension

public interface AnalysisExtension
OpenSearch doesn't have any automatic mechanism to share these components between indexes. If any component is heavy enough to warrant such sharing then it is the Extension's responsibility to do it in their AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider implementation. We recommend against doing this unless absolutely necessary because it can be difficult to get the caching right given things like behavior changes across versions.

  • Method Details

    • getCharFilters

      default Map<String,org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<org.opensearch.index.analysis.CharFilterFactory>> getCharFilters()
      Override to add additional CharFilters. See requiresAnalysisSettings(AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider) how to on get the configuration from the index.
      Returns:
      a map of additional CharFilter providers. The key is a string representing the provider name, and the value is the provider itself.

    • getTokenFilters

      default Map<String,org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<org.opensearch.index.analysis.TokenFilterFactory>> getTokenFilters()
      Override to add additional TokenFilters. See requiresAnalysisSettings(AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider) how to on get the configuration from the index.
      Returns:
      a map of additional TokenFilter providers. The key is a string representing the provider name, and the value is the provider itself.

    • getTokenizers

      default Map<String,org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<org.opensearch.index.analysis.TokenizerFactory>> getTokenizers()
      Override to add additional Tokenizers. See requiresAnalysisSettings(AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider) how to on get the configuration from the index.
      Returns:
      a map of additional Tokenizer providers. The key is a string representing the provider name, and the value is the provider itself.

    • getAnalyzers

      default Map<String,org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<org.opensearch.index.analysis.AnalyzerProvider<? extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer>>> getAnalyzers()
      Override to add additional Analyzers. See requiresAnalysisSettings(AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider) how to on get the configuration from the index.
      Returns:
      a map of additional Analyzer providers. The key is a string representing the provider name, and the value is the provider itself.

      Returns:

      default Map<String,org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell.Dictionary> getHunspellDictionaries()
      Override to add additional hunspell Dictionarys.
      Returns:
      an empty Map that has a key of type String and a value of type org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell.Dictionary.

    • requiresAnalysisSettings

      static <T> org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<T> requiresAnalysisSettings(org.opensearch.indices.analysis.AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider<T> provider)
      Mark an AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider as requiring the index's settings.
      Type Parameters:
      T - is a type parameter that specifies the type of the analysis module that will be returned by the provider.
      Parameters:
      provider - this is an instance of the basic interface for analysis components.
      Returns:
      an AnalysisModule.AnalysisProvider instance that requires analysis settings.
